section.title: Overview
section.description: The Close Form/Browse action closes the current window, or another form or browse window.

step.description: Make a selection in the *[ui:Close which Form or Browse window?]* field. This field will be grayed out unless this action is based on a Form or Browse. The choices are:
In the *[ui:How will you specify which Form or Browse window to close?]* field select either:

item.name: *[ui:By specifying the name of the Form or Browse window]*
*[ui:By specifying a Form or Browse Pointer variable]*

step.description: If you selected *[ui:By specifying the name of the Form or Browse window]*, select a layout in the *[ui:Window Name]* field. You may also type in the name of a form or browse.
If you selected *[ui:By specifying a Form or Browse Pointer variable]*, enter the pointer name into the *[ui:Pointer Name]* field.
Optionally, check the box to automatically save the current record, if the user has not already saved it.
Optionally, modify the comment that describes the action.
